events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer position from the candidate and will begin the review process promptly.
The candidate's application has been categorized under the engineering department based on their experience in software development.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate's progression through the engineering hiring process.
The initial screening call went well, discussing the candidate's software engineering background and project experience in detail.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm for the technical interview and readiness to proceed further in the hiring process.
The technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to assess their software development skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding skills and a good understanding of system design concepts.
An HR interview has been scheduled to evaluate the candidate's cultural fit and discuss employment terms moving forward.
The HR interview concluded successfully with positive feedback regarding the candidate's alignment with company values and expectations.
An offer for the software engineer role has been extended to the candidate, outlining salary, benefits, and other employment conditions.
The candidate has provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer, confirming their start date and excitement to contribute as a software engineer.
The onboarding process for the new software engineer has begun, including system access setup and introduction to the dev team.
The hiring process is complete, and the candidate has successfully integrated into the engineering department.
